actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to provide for an audit by the General Accounting Office of the Federal Reserve Board, banks, and branches, to extend section 14(b) of the Federal Reserve Act, and to provide an additional $60 million for the construction of Federal Reserve Bank branch buildings, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for an audit by the General Accounting Office of the Federal Reserve Board, banks, and branches. Authorize appropriation of an additional $60,000,000 for the construction of Federal Reserve bank branch buildings.

titles.title: A bill to provide for an audit by the General Accounting Office of the Federal Reserve Board, banks, and branches, to extend section 14(b) of the Federal Reserve Act, and to provide an additional $60 million for the construction of Federal Reserve Bank branch buildings, and for other purposes.
